---
title: "git_provided_with_ref_type.yml"
---

## High-level description
This YAML file defines a configuration for storage using Git. It specifies the repository URL, directory, and reference type for a Git-based storage system.

## Symbols

### `storage`
#### Description
The `storage` key is the root configuration object that defines the storage settings for the application.

#### Internal Logic
The `storage` object contains two main properties:
1. `type`: Specifies the storage type as "git".
2. `git`: Contains the Git-specific configuration details.

### `storage.type`
#### Description
Specifies the type of storage to be used.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| type | string | The type of storage, set to "git" in this case |

### `storage.git`
#### Description
Contains the configuration details specific to Git storage.

#### Internal Logic
The `git` object includes three properties:
1. `repository`: The Git repository URL.
2. `directory`: The directory within the repository to be used.
3. `ref_type`: The type of reference to be used for versioning.

### `storage.git.repository`
#### Description
Specifies the URL of the Git repository to be used for storage.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| repository | string | The Git repository URL in SSH format |

### `storage.git.directory`
#### Description
Specifies the directory within the Git repository to be used for storage.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| directory | string | The directory name within the repository |

### `storage.git.ref_type`
#### Description
Specifies the type of reference to be used for versioning in the Git repository.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| ref_type | string | The reference type, set to "semver" in this case |

## Configuration
| Option | Type | Default | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| storage.type | string | N/A | The type of storage, set to "git" |
| storage.git.repository | string | N/A | The Git repository URL |
| storage.git.directory | string | N/A | The directory within the repository |
| storage.git.ref_type | string | N/A | The reference type for versioning |

This configuration file is likely used as test data for a system that supports Git-based storage with semantic versioning. The file name suggests it's specifically for testing scenarios where a Git storage is provided with a reference type.
